! parse
err 'cannot reference auth handler svc.MyAuth from another package'

-- svc/svc.go --
package svc

import (
    "context"
    "encore.dev/beta/auth"
)

type MyData struct {
    Name string
}

//encore:authhandler
func MyAuth(ctx context.Context, token string) (auth.UID, *MyData, error) { return "", nil, nil }

-- svc2/svc2.go --
package svc2

import (
    "context"
    "test/svc"
)

func Foo() {
    svc.MyAuth(context.Background(), "foo")
}
